name: One Piece Movies Vinyl Soundtrack Best Selection 2x
description:
One Piece Vinyl Original Soundtrack. Official product by Microids Records.

Immerse yourself in the musical universe of ONE PIECE MOVIES - BEST SELECTION !

Discover the music from the One Piece films for the first time on vinyl!

Over 70 minutes of music that will take you on a journey through the adventures of the famous crew of the straw hat! 

FACE A

The thieving brothers make their appearance 

Sanji's in trouble! 

Terror of the Cannon King 

Boroodo's confession 

Rage of the Bear King 

Zoro, the spirited swordsman 

Bet your life on it! 

Mother, then departure 

The butler and his sidekick appear! 

An enemy arrives!

Sanji vs Snake 

FACE B

A great fight! 

A fierce battle! Zoro & Sanji 

Shuraiya vs Needles 

Go ahead and fly! 

The power of Gasparde 

Shuraiya's past 

As long as you're alive 

Luffy appears! 

The sea swordsman's battle cry 

The action begins 

Three turns 

Luffy's ferocious attack

Resort island 

Sinking... 

Attention 

Thoughts don't go far enough 

FACE C

Karakuri defence system, activate! 

Karakuri defence system, deploy! 

Something terrible is awakening! 

It's waking up! 

A mother's love 

The golden crown exists! 

Ratchet's ambition 

Karakuri Castle, transform yourselves! 

Straw-hatted pirates, start your counter-attack! 

Giant fortress, take off! 

Karakuri on guard! 

Luffy versus Ratchet Round 1 

Zoro versus General Maji 

Sanji versus Captain Honki

Luffy versus Ratchet Round 2 

FACE D

I'll outdo you!!! 

Condemnation of the Blackbeard pirates

Be quiet! !! Let's go !!!!

Daft Green ~Cause of Tragedy~ (cause of tragedy)

Gathering ~Last desperate hope~

The operation begins ~The village is destroyed~

Terror of the giant animals ~Things were already bad!

Sanji's wind leg ~It's a taste of East Blue love~

The final battle ~Giant Thor's axe~

Song of triumph ~Islands fall into the sea, people fly to the sky~
